New Records: LeBron James scored a season-high 38 points
Max Christie had a career-high 28 points
Key Match Events: The Lakers overcame Anthony Davis' absence for a 114-106 victory over the Portland Trail Blazers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers have won six of eight games
The Lakers have beaten the Trail Blazers for the fifth straight time
Others: Austin Reaves contributed 15 points, 11 assists and eight rebounds
